title: Want to Buy/Trade For - Low Grade Polar Bears
author: rommesc

posts.post_title: Want to Buy/Trade For - Low Grade Polar Bears
posts.post_content:
Taking a shot at the Polar Bear Subset and currently targeting the 9 cards listed below.  Prefer raw, but open to graded as well. Please send a PM if you happen to have any of these available.  Thanks in advance!

Armbuster, Portrait(Polar Bear)
Cobb, Red Portrait(Polar Bear)
Grimshaw(Polar Bear)
Jordan, Batting(Polar Bear)
Kelley, Batting(Polar Bear)
McGraw, Glove at Hip(Polar Bear)
Overall, Hands at Waist(Polar Bear)
Stanage, Fielding(Polar Bear)
Taylor, Ready to Throw(Polar Bear)
Anyone have duplicates of these cards available?
Still looking.  Please send PM if you have low grade Polar Bears for sale or trade.
